message.raw: Enhanced the platform identification to detect Xbox 360, PS3 and PSP correctly. This is simply to provide a slightly nicer 'out-of-the-box' experience for console developers. NOTE: These platforms still remain unsupported and may not build correctly, however this shouldn't now be because of a '#error' directive.
